reports.description: Food item appears to contain banned ingredient not mentioned in description. Contains allergen information missing.
reports.actionTaken: Food item removed. Restaurant warned. Allergen info updated on all items.
reports.notes: Restaurant owner acknowledged oversight and implemented new allergen checking process.

reports.description: This review is fake. The user has never ordered from this restaurant according to order history. Likely competitor sabotage.
reports.actionTaken: Fake review removed. User suspended for review manipulation.
reports.notes: Account shows 0 orders from this restaurant but 5-star review. Clearly fraudulent.

reports.description: Multiple customer complaints about food safety. Images show improper food handling and storage conditions.
reports.notes: Health inspection scheduled. Restaurant under observation. 3 complaints received in past week.

reports.description: User left abusive and threatening messages to delivery partner. Unacceptable language and threats.
reports.actionTaken: User account suspended for 7 days. Warning issued. Delivery partner compensated.
reports.notes: This is user's 2nd violation. Next violation will result in permanent ban.

reports.description: Food description says 'fresh daily' but reviews mention it was frozen. Image appears to be stock photo, not actual product.
